title: Can Pogačar Do the Double? These 5 Stages Will Decide Who Wins the Tour de France
content:
Where will the yellow jersey be won? A stupid-hard opener, some gravel, and the most explosive Tour de France finale in decades will decide.

Read the full article at Can Pogačar Do the Double? These 5 Stages Will Decide Who Wins the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
